name: Kukubima
description: A herbal drink specially formulated to enhance men's vitality and stamina.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Longjack is a traditional aphrodisiac plant known to enhance libido and stamina in men.
Turmeric has anti-inflammatory properties and improves blood flow to the reproductive organs, aiding in enhancing men's sexual health.
Coffee contains caffeine which can boost energy, focus, and physical performance.

fullIngredients: Longjack Extract, Turmeric Extract, Arabica Coffee, Sugar, Water

name: Tolak Angin
description: A herbal supplement made from natural ingredients to boost immunity and aid digestion.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Ginger has anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial properties, helping with stomach issues and boosting the immune system.
Cinnamon has antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties, aiding in improving blood circulation and reducing the risk of infections.
Turmeric is rich in curcumin which has anti-inflammatory properties and stimulates digestive enzyme production, helping to alleviate digestive issues.

fullIngredients: Ginger Extract, Cinnamon Extract, Turmeric Extract, Honey, Water, Fennel Extract

name: Sido Muncul Natural Black Cumin 30 Capsules
excerpt: Natural Supplement for Immune System Support
description: Sido Muncul Natural Black Cumin capsules are a natural supplement to support the immune system and overall health.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Black cumin seeds are rich in antioxidants and have been traditionally used to support immune function and promote overall wellness.
Ginger has anti-inflammatory and immune-boosting properties, aiding in strengthening the body's defenses against illnesses.
Honey is known for its antibacterial and antiviral properties, helping to fight off infections and promote healing.

fullIngredients: Black Cumin Seed Extract, Ginger Extract, Honey, Gelatin, Glycerin, Purified Water

name: Sido Muncul Natural Vitamin E 100 IU Soft Capsule
description: Sido Muncul Natural Vitamin E soft capsules provide antioxidant support for overall health and well-being.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Vitamin E is a powerful antioxidant that helps protect cells from damage caused by free radicals, supporting immune function and skin health.
Soybean oil is rich in unsaturated fats and vitamin E, promoting heart health and reducing inflammation in the body.
Gelatin is used to encapsulate the vitamin E oil, providing a convenient and easy-to-swallow soft capsule.

fullIngredients: Vitamin E (d-alpha tocopherol), Soybean Oil, Gelatin, Glycerin, Purified Water

name: Sido Muncul Vitamin C 1000 Orange Powder
excerpt: Orange Flavored Powder for Immune System Support
description: Sido Muncul Vitamin C 1000 Orange Powder provides a convenient and delicious way to support your immune system and overall health.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Vitamin C is a powerful antioxidant that helps boost the immune system, promote collagen production for skin health, and improve iron absorption.
Natural orange flavor adds a refreshing taste to the powder, making it enjoyable to consume and easy to incorporate into your daily routine.
Fructose is a natural sweetener derived from fruits, providing a pleasant sweetness to the powder without the need for added sugar.

fullIngredients: Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Orange Flavor, Fructose, Citric Acid, Sodium Bicarbonate

name: Sido Muncul Natural Vitamin D3 400 IU Soft Capsule
description: Sido Muncul Natural Vitamin D3 soft capsules provide essential support for bone health and overall well-being.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Vitamin D3 is crucial for maintaining strong bones and teeth, regulating calcium absorption, and supporting immune function.
Sunflower oil is rich in unsaturated fats and vitamin E, aiding in cardiovascular health and promoting healthy skin.
Gelatin is used to encapsulate the vitamin D3 oil, providing a convenient and easy-to-swallow soft capsule.

fullIngredients: Vitamin D3 (Cholecalciferol), Sunflower Oil, Gelatin, Glycerin, Purified Water

name: Sido Muncul CoQ10 Coenzyme Q10 Soft Capsule

description: Sido Muncul CoQ10 Coenzyme Q10 Soft Capsule is a powerful antioxidant supplement designed to combat free radicals and promote overall health.

Soybean oil is rich in unsaturated fats and vitamin E, supporting heart health and reducing inflammation in the body.
Gelatin is used to encapsulate the CoQ10 oil, providing a convenient and easy-to-swallow soft capsule.

description: Sido Muncul Jamu Gemuk Sehat is a herbal supplement formulated to help improve appetite and promote healthy weight gain.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Ginger is known to stimulate digestion and increase appetite, aiding in better nutrient absorption.

name: Sido Muncul Powder Blend Mix Kunyit Asam + Kunyit Asam

description: Sido Muncul Permen Tolak Angin Bebas Gula are sugar-free throat lozenges specially formulated to soothe a scratchy throat and provide relief.

name: Kuku Bima Ener-G! RTD Red Berry

Enriched with vitamins B complex, essential for energy metabolism and supporting overall vitality.

name: Sido Kliin Hand Gel
description: Sido Kliin Hand Gel is a hand sanitizer formulated with 70% alcohol to effectively kill germs and bacteria, providing convenient hand hygiene on the go.

heroIngredients.heroDesc: Contains 70% alcohol (ethanol) as the active ingredient, proven to kill 99.9% of germs and bacteria upon contact.
Enriched with aloe vera extract to moisturize and soothe the skin, preventing dryness and irritation from frequent use.
Glycerin helps to retain moisture in the skin, leaving hands feeling soft and hydrated after each use.

description: Sido Muncul Tentrem White Coffee offers a delightful blend of coffee with creamy milk, providing a rich and satisfying beverage experience.
